This workshop is about setting up a research compendium using the R package structure as a blue print.
If you want to set up your own research compendium, you can follow the instructions in the 
[How-To section](https://selinazitrone.github.io/YoMos2020/how_to.html).
If you want to follow the presentation, have a look at the [Presentation section](https://selinazitrone.github.io/YoMos2020/slidy_presentation.html#(1)).
